bug.author: JoanFM
bug.summary: Message can't be processed if chunks of different types in a message
bug.description:
Describe your problem Right now when accepting a message from a Pod, it is considered to have a single chunk_byte_type , when it should have more. PR to handle issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/pull/968>#968</denchmark-link>
â”†Issue is synchronized with this <denchmark-link:https://jinaai.atlassian.net/browse/JINACORE-236>Jira Task</denchmark-link> by <denchmark-link:https://www.unito.io/learn-more>Unito</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This has an easy workaround, by turning off the optimization provided by the parameter array_in_pb being set to False. So using array_in_pb=True in the Peas arguments, would enable the passing of different chunk types in the same message.
